underlying_goal: Execute a team-based task to restructure 4 Pattern 1 modules (LinkedIn Creator, X Creator, X Trending, Analytics) from a Search Agent → Analysis Agent architecture to a Fetch → Creator-Critic loop architecture, including updating team.md, agent-config.yaml, and replacing agent spec files.
friction_detail: Claude hit 'Prompt is too long' errors three times near the end of the session, requiring the user to nudge it to continue with 'carry on plz'.
brief_summary: User (via team-lead orchestration) asked Claude to restructure 4 Pattern 1 modules to a new architecture by rewriting spec files; Claude completed all file changes successfully despite hitting prompt length limits near the end.
